name: Clockwork Planets
description:
Clockwork Planets is an addictive casual puzzle game about rotating planets in color-coded orbits! You will have to collect points in exotic star systems including binary stars and red supergiants, while keeping planets safe from incoming asteroids. How long can you last?

-Touch to rotate planets in their color-coded orbits and collect points
-Jump to new solar systems including binary star systems and black holes
-Unlock dozens of exotic spinning planets
-Addictive gameplay: easy to learn but hard to master
-Compare your best score to players around the world and unlock numerous achievements
-Perfect for playing quick games on the go, on the bus or on the subway.
